text: Besides the holocaust of the first day of the month with the sacrifices thereof, and the perpetual holocaust with the accustomed libations, with the same ceremonies you shall offer a burnt sacrifice for a most sweet odor to the Lord.

segments.text: Besides the holocaust of the first day of the month with the sacrifices thereof, and
the perpetual holocaust with the accustomed libations, with the same ceremonies you shall
offer a burnt sacrifice for a most sweet odor to the Lord.
